Comprehensive Fall Arrest System Solutions

Fall Arrest System Products

Retractable Fall Arrester Block

Automatic locking device that arrests a fall within a short distance, ideal for vertical and horizontal applications.

Vertical Fall Arrester

Designed for safe vertical movement, this device follows the user and locks instantly in the event of a fall.

Ascender & Descender

Mechanical device for controlled ascent and descent on ropes, ensuring safety during vertical operations.

Spidermak Kits

Complete fall arrest kits for various applications, including harness, connectors, and storage bag for maximum safety.
